---
title: "Testnet"
---
Go through our onboarding tutorials:

* [Migrate your EVM smart contract](/build/tutorials/migrate-contract)
* [Use subscriptions in your contract](/build/tutorials/use-subscriptions)
* [Get a subscription plan](/learn/arthera-wallet#buying-a-subscription)
* [Manage your subscription](/learn/arthera-wallet#manage-the-subscription)

Use your favorite Ethereum development tools to work with smart contracts on Arthera:

- [**Hardhat**](https://hardhat.org/)
- [**Truffle**](https://trufflesuite.com/)
- [**Alchemy**](https://docs.alchemy.com/reference/alchemy-sdk-quickstart)
- [**Remix**](https://remix.ethereum.org/)
- [**OpenZeppelin**](https://docs.openzeppelin.com/contracts/4.x/)

Just set the coordinates to Arthera Testnet
- **RPC Endpoint: `https://rpc-test.arthera.net`**
- **WebSocket Endpoint: `wss://ws-test.arthera.net`**
- **Chain ID: `10243`**
- **Explorer: https://explorer-test.arthera.net **
- **Wallet: https://wallet-test.arthera.net **
- **API Gateways**:
    * https://gw-eu1-test.arthera.net
    * https://gw-eu2-test.arthera.net
    * https://gw-us1-test.arthera.net

Get some coins from our [Testnet Faucet](https://faucet.arthera.net)
